languages.text: {n}При словах провидца лицо Маражая вытягивается, он открывает рот, но без толку — кажется, друкари потерял дар речи.{/n}
{n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При словах провидца лицо Маражая вытягивается, он открывает рот, но без толку — кажется, друкари потерял дар речи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At the seer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the gift of speech.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the seer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the gift of speech.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the gift of the gab.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the gift of the gab.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of the speech.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of the speech.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Marazhai se crispe en entendant les mots du Grand Prophète. Il ouvre la bouche pour parler, mais aucun son n'en sort. Le Drukhari semble soudain incapable de s'exprimer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Marazhai se crispe en entendant les mots du Grand Prophète. Il ouvre la bouche pour parler, mais aucun son n'en sort. Le Drukhari semble soudain incapable de s'exprimer.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到先知的话之后，玛拉斋的脸紧紧地绷在了那里。他试图张开口，但却无济于事，仿佛已经说不出来话了一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到先知的话之后，玛拉斋的脸紧紧地绷在了那里。他试图张开口，但却无济于事，仿佛失去了说话的能力一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}先見司の言葉にマラズハイは顔をこわばらせ、言葉を発しようとしたが無駄に終わった。デュカーリは喋る力を失ったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}先見司の言葉にマラズハイは顔をこわばらせ、言葉を発しようとしたが無駄に終わった。デュカーリは喋る力を失ったようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bei den Worten des Runenpropheten erstarrt Marazhais Gesicht und er öffnet den Mund, allerdings vergeblich. Dem Drukhari scheint es die Sprache verschlagen zu haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei den Worten des Runenpropheten erstarrt Marazhais Gesicht und er öffnet den Mund, allerdings vergeblich. Der Drukhari scheint die Fähigkeit des Sprechens verloren zu haben.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al oír las palabras del vidente, Marazhai se queda pasmado y abre la boca, pero no emite sonido alguno. El Drukhari parece haber perdido su don del habla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al oír las palabras del vidente, Marazhai se queda pasmado y abre la boca, pero no emite sonido alguno. El Drukhari parece haber perdido su don para la labia.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ötesezen'in dediklerini duyunca Marazhai'ın yüzü kaskatı kesiliyor. Ağzını açsa da bir şey diyemiyor. Drukhari, an için konuşma yetisini kaybediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At the Farseer's words, Marazhai's face stiffens and he opens his mouth, but to no avail. The Drukhari appears to have lost the power of speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ötesezenin dediklerini duyunca Marazhai'ın yüzü kaskatı kesiliyor. Ağzını açsa da bir şey diyemiyor. Drukhari, konuşma yetisini kaybetmiş sanki.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
